### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper plate mine 
No copper plate mine found

### Lab and research facility at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab(position x=2.5, y=0.5), burner inserter(position x=3.5, y=0.5), and small electric pole(position x=2.5, y=1.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using set_research function
-  Make sure the technology exists and the lab has the required items to start the research
-  Ensure the lab is not already researching another technology

### Errors when using insert_item function
-  Ensure the item exists in the game and the lab has enough space to insert the item
-  Make sure the item is in the agent's inventory before attempting to insert it into the lab

### Errors when using Prototype
-  Ensure the prototype name is correct and exists in the game
-  Use the correct prototype name, for example, LogisticsSciencePack instead of LogisticSciencePack

### Errors when inserting items into a lab
-  Ensure the lab has the required items to insert, for example, automation-science-pack
-  Make sure the item is in the agent's inventory before attempting to insert it into the lab
